name: Ancient Fire Still Burns
description:
A village is desperate for a Crystal of energy, the only source of mana.

When the Crystal gets lost in the nearby forest, Mirta and Fedro travel deep in the forest to try and find it on their own. The lost Crystal isn't the only thing they'll find in there...

CONTROLS

The game is a visual novel.

Advance through text with Enter / Spacebar.
Use the number keys 1 - 4 to pick dialogue options.
You can press Escape to return to the main menu at any point - the game will save the last visited scene.

CREDITS
